metadata.title: CVE-2021-32565 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Invalid values in the Content-Length header sent to Apache Traffic Serverallows an attacker to smuggle requests. This issue affects Apache TrafficServer 7.0.0 to 7.1.12, 8.0.0 to 8.1.1, 9.0.0 to 9.0.1.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
